translated: The Great Chapter🔽The Story of the Son of a Money-lender

analyzed: paripuṇṇāni sabbaso  niraye  kadā antaḥ bhavissati
translated: have passed completely;🔽When will there be an end🔽of my being cooked in hell?
There is no end, how could there be an end?
An end is not to be seen;
So great is the evil you have done,
We have lived a hard life,
we who did not give to the peaceful ones;
In the peaceful ones, who are worthy of gifts,
we have not made an island for ourselves.
So now, having gone from here,
having obtained a human state of existence,
may I, being generous and virtuous,
The Story of the Son of a Money-lender is the fifteenth.
